region_description: Komodo Island is famous for its stunning natural beauty and unique wildlife, including the iconic Komodo dragons. This UNESCO World Heritage Site is part of the Komodo National Park, which features spectacular landscapes, crystal-clear waters, and diverse marine life. Visitors can explore pristine beaches, go snorkeling or diving in vibrant coral reefs, and hike through rugged terrains to witness the majestic Komodo dragons in their natural habitat. The combination of adventure and breathtaking scenery makes Komodo Island a must-visit destination for nature lovers and thrill-seekers.

places_to_visit.name: Komodo National Park
places_to_visit.description: Komodo National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site that includes the islands of Komodo, Rinca, and Padar. The park is famous for its Komodo dragons and offers stunning landscapes, including rugged hills, beaches, and marine biodiversity.

places_to_visit.name: Pink Beach
places_to_visit.description: Pink Beach is renowned for its unique pink sand, created by crushed red coral. The beach is perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and snorkeling, offering a serene escape in a picturesque setting.

places_to_visit.name: Rinca Island
places_to_visit.description: Rinca Island is one of the best places to see Komodo dragons in their natural habitat. The island features rugged landscapes and hiking trails, allowing visitors to observe these fascinating reptiles up close.

places_to_visit.name: Padar Island
places_to_visit.description: Padar Island is famous for its stunning viewpoints and unique landscapes. The hike to the top rewards visitors with panoramic views of the surrounding islands and the vibrant blue sea.

hotels.name: Bintang Flores Hotel
hotels.description: Bintang Flores Hotel offers comfortable accommodations with stunning views of the sea. The hotel features a restaurant, outdoor pool, and easy access to Labuan Bajo's attractions.

hotels.name: La Prima Hotel
hotels.description: La Prima Hotel is a modern hotel in Labuan Bajo, providing stylish rooms and a restaurant. It is conveniently located near the harbor for easy access to boat trips.

restaurants.name: The Lounge
restaurants.description: The Lounge is a cozy restaurant in Labuan Bajo, offering a variety of local and international dishes. The ambiance is relaxed, making it a great place to unwind after a day of exploring.

restaurants.name: Warung Mama
restaurants.description: Warung Mama is a popular eatery known for its delicious Indonesian dishes. The casual setting and affordable prices make it a favorite among locals and tourists.
